name: Spaceship Tilt
description:
Spaceship Tilt is a Bullet-Hell Shoot-Em-Up where you control the ship by tilting your phone, pitch yourself against one enemy spaceship at a time, Boss-Rush style! Fight against different types of enemy spaceship, with each of them having different attack pattern, behaviour, and require different strategy to fight. Strip them apart with your trusty blaster!

  • Bullet hell with the focus on recognizing attack pattern and dodging attack with only horizontal movement!
  • Fight against different enemy ship, all with different behaviour, attack pattern, multiple form, and require different tactic to defeat!
  • Different equipment that tweak your spaceship to suit your playstyle!
  • Intense, skill based, arcade style game where if you lose, you have to start over!
  • Simple control, tilt to move, tap to shoot!
